name: ReadWriteProperty
signature: interface ReadWriteProperty<in T, V> : ReadOnlyProperty<T, V>

items.text: abstract operator fun getValue( thisRef: T, property: KProperty<*>): V
items.desc: Returns the value of the property for the given object.

items.text: abstract operator fun setValue( thisRef: T, property: KProperty<*>, value: V)
items.desc: Sets the value of the property for the given object.
Implements the core logic of a property delegate for a read/write property that calls callback functions when changed.
